text: Perdaxius (Perdàxius) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sud Sardegna in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 1,455 people live there. Its area is 29.5 km². It is 98 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Communes of the Province of South Sardinia
title: Perdaxius
